page.title: 11A Monday in Ayton.
page.content: {Joanne Hunter says:- On Mondays I get up at 6.30a.m. practice my trumpet for a couple of minutes,go downstairs,get dressed,make a cup of coffee for my Mam and then it's 7.00a.m.I give the dog its dinner,get washed, make my bed,get my Mam and sisters up,make breakfast and go to school.School starts at 9.00a.m. but Marie and I are always late.We do Topic,have Assembly at quarter past ten and then playtime at twenty to eleven.After play it's P.E. and we get the box out and practice,then it's dinner time.In the afternoon we have Maths and English,then playtime,then netball and home.I play in the wood with Marie.The wood is beside Makro a local hypermarket.
